title: The Essex Serpent vivid green lichen

content.question: In referring to Times Square as a “neon inferno” in the final paragraph, the narrator emphasizes both the brightness of Times Square’s lights and

choices.label: the sense that its lights are spreading throughout the city
the wickedness of the people inhabiting its crowded streets
the severity of the injuries suffered by the people inside the ambulance
the garish appearance it has compared to the sky above it

content.answer: the garish appearance it has compared to the sky above it

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
